items.title: Anker’s 165W display-equipped 25K power bank with retractable USB-C cable just hit a new all-time low at $82
items.summary:
Over at Newegg, you’ll find Anker’s official storefront offering its 25,000mAh 165W power bank for $81.99 shipped as part of its wider sale that’s now live at up to 58% off. Don’t forget to enter promo code BNE4355 during checkout to see the discounted price. This particular model has fetched as much as $135 in recent months, although it has lately been selling for $120 at Amazon. The promo code takes $53 off its listed price, landing it $38 below its usual going rate. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this battery pack, and it’s now $10 less than its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. It is available in black and silver, and they’re both down to the $82 low today.

items.title: First pre-order discounts on Metroid Prime 4: Beyond now live at Costco from $53
items.summary:
Update: As you might know, Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition recently made its way to Switch 2, and you can now score it with a nice launch deal down at $17.99. 

While you will still find a growing list of early Black Friday Amazon console game deals down below, today we are highlighting some pre-order deals at Costco on Nintendo Switch 2’s big holiday game release – Metroid Prime 4: Beyond. Set for release on December 4 with the latest overview trailer waiting for you right here, Costco members pre privy to the first chance at savings with the Switch version down at $52.99 and the Switch 2 Edition selling for $62.99 shipped. Regularly $60 and $70 a pop, these are the first and best chances to score a deal on Switch 2 biggest release of the holiday season. Everyone else (those without access to a Costco membership) will have to pay the full $70 at Amazon and the like.

items.title: Danish Social Democrats lose ground in local polls on cost-of-living, welfare concerns
items.summary: COPENHAGEN (Reuters) -Denmark's ruling Social Democratic Party suffered big losses in municipal elections, official results showed on Wednesday, less than a year before a national vote, amid public discontent with the cost of living and eroding welfare services. Read full story

items.title: Add Dyson’s Airwrap Origin with Coanda hair-wrapping action to your styling routine at $400 (Reg. $550)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Dyson is offering the Airwrap Origin Multi-Styler at $399.99 shipped. Outside of these occasional discounts, which we usually see during specific holiday seasons and Prime Day events, you’d have to pay $550 for this handy multi-styler at full price. Over the year, we’ve only seen five discounts, with today’s rate only beaten out by a one-time fall to $375 back in July. While that rate is not coming back right now, you can score it at the next-best price, courtesy of this $150 markdown – and it’s here just in time for your holiday shopping needs!
